Title.title: From Spotify to Deezer and the other way around

Card.spotifyUser: You can now share this link to a Spotify User
Card.deezerUser: You can now share this link to a Deezer User

Error.title: Oooops something went wrong
Error.description: It can happen that the libraries between streaming services are not the same, so either the song you are        looking for is not available, or your link is broken. Another possibility is that I did a poor job, in which case I apologize for the inconvenience!
Error.ctaCall: No panic, you can try again
